lines.text:
[their first view of the Iceman]
What do you think?
A Cleveland Indian. What do I know? You're the anthropologist.
[Charlie brings a dark object to Brady]
An offering. He wants you to eat it.
I was afraid you'd say that.
A beetle. What did it taste like?
A beetle. I think I'm going to throw up.
Don't! He'll take it as a bad omen.
I, who was born to die, shall live. That the world of animals, and the world of men, may come together, I shall live. - Inuit Legend

[first lines - to co-worker barging in from the blizzard]
Damn it Shephard, close the door please.

[expressing trepidation at meeting the Iceman]
You know Shephard, I was stepped on by a pony when I was 6.
I promise, I won't let him step on you.
